SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
One would have to be either a great fool or
an individual of considerable valor to trespass
upon the abode of the Dismal King.
So tell me: which are you?

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Mmm. You are neither fool nor
valorous to disorient me so.
Clearly you are more than you seem.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
And what is this!? My connection to my
thralls is being severed!? Ah, of course.
You have already brought the tower
wardens under your control.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Do not think, however, that things will
all proceed according to your designs—
for I am the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my body's blood!

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Such a stagnant, oppressive atmosphere.
I can say with certainty that this is my
beloved kingdom of the dark.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
My master lives once more! All hail the
Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here and
now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I am not your master, maid—I am
the Dismal King, supreme lord in
the land of Yomi.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My master has become the Dismal King AND
been revived!? That I, Dolores, should be
graced by the opportunity to serve you is
the greatest honor of my life!

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Though you appear to misunderstand the
circumstances in a number of critical ways,
I suppose it is of no consequence. I shall permit you to serve me, maid.
Tell me then, what has become of
these lands while I was away?

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Strife broke out between the seven
tower wardens, leaving their numbers
culled to four. Tyranny has been the guiding principle of
their reign, and the subjects of the dark
clamor for the return of their Dismal King. And I beg you as well: Return to your
rightful place upon the throne and
punish the four greedy wardens!

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
How very amusing—though I would expect no less
of my servants. And while I would be well-served
to return promptly to my castle, it might prove
most entertaining to check in on the wardens.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_020.text:
Oh, my Dismal King! I, the Warden of Pride,
reincarnated as a maid, have long awaited
your return. Clearly my audience with you
has restored my memories!

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Yes, your Dismal King is returned.
Now tell me, what has transpired
in these lands during my absence?

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Strife broke out between the seven
tower wardens, leaving their numbers
culled to four. The remaining wardens then concealed your
absence, and played at being your guardians
and agents. They must be punished!

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_050.text:
How very amusing—though I would expect no
less of my servants. Indeed, had you been in
their position, I am certain you would be
acting as they now do, Warden of Pride.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_060.text:
But as you have come here and supplicated
yourself in prayer before me, I shall permit
you to serve me once more.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_070.text:
That is most gracious, my Dismal King.
I, the Warden of Pride, swear now to
give unto you all that I am.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_010_080.text:
Let us be off, then.
We make for the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And what is this form you have assumed,
Warden of Gluttony? Shall I take this to mean
you have ceased your wanton eating?

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Indeed, my Dismal King! For I have learned
the pleasures of movement, as well as a
well-balanced and nutritive diet!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yet in so doing, you have lost your virtue.
You have cast aside your unique ability to
eat with abandon and surrender yourself
to the pleasure of the moment.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You mean to say I am mistaken, my lord?
Must I surrender the power of darkness
if I wish to maintain a healthy lifestyle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Have you so quickly lost the ability
to discern between right and wrong?
This is a great shame. But worry not. For I, your Dismal King,
shall restore you to your proper form!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Is restored to what it once was. And with
you clad once more in your rightful flesh,
I shall permit you to resume your watch
over the Tower of Gluttony.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Thank you, my king! Indeed,
I now feel myself seized with
pangs of righteous hunger!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
And what is this form you have assumed,
Warden of Lust? Shall I take this to mean
you have ceased giving yourself over to
your every wanton desire?

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Indeed, my Dismal King! I have learned
to control my desire, and through
moderation gained self-discipline!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yet in so doing, you have lost your virtue.
The joy of being possessed of unforgivable
desire—of being freed from the norms that
bind all—is what gave you power. Do you truly claim to no longer
have need of such rapture?

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I no longer require such appetites,
for there are untold other pleasures
awaiting me in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Lust is the power to transcend limits.
Stripped of such power, you have no
claim upon the office you once held!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_010_010.text:
My Dismal King, I am now seized with lust
for all that you represent! I beg you to take
your leave before all control deserts me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_LUST_000_CUT_010_020.text:
With you clad once more in your rightful
flesh, I shall permit you to resume your
watch over the Tower of Lust.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_000.text:
And what is this form you have assumed,
Warden of Sloth? Shall I take this to mean
you have given up ceaseless slumber and
now pursue a life of diligent labor?

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Indeed, my Dismal King! I began to feel that
endless sleeping was a waste of good time,
for the world changes each moment while we
sleep, and idleness proves a great enemy!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yet in so doing, you have lost your virtue.
Spare not even a moment's thought to the
passage of time—such is the pride and
purview of subjects of the dark. For while you once surpassed even your 
Dismal King in this regard, you are now
trapped within the river of time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Time is a river whose flow cannot be stopped
even by those who have gone beyond death.
Time cannot be fought. It cannot be ignored.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Yet time means naught to your king,
and so I shall unburden your mind of it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Is restored to what it once was. And with
you clad once more in your rightful flesh,
I shall permit you to resume your watch
over the Tower of Sloth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_SLOTH_000_CUT_010_020.text:
I fear my energy wanes, my king...
Pray forgive me my impertinence...
in falling asleep before you...

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
And what is this form you have assumed,
Warden of Wrath? Shall I take this to mean
you have ceased your raging and now claim
to be in control of your anger?

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Indeed, my Dismal King! I have ceased
such foolish behaviors as beating my
own subordinates to death! There is no place for anger in battle;
victory and glory alone are enough.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yet in so doing, you have lost your virtue.
A fight without anger is a lie, for what
darkness can be had in battle for the
sake of victory and glory alone? No. What gave you beauty was pure anger
and the raw violence which quelled it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The lauding of my peers is
enough to satisfy me now.
Anger only begets fear.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
You have grown so weak, I can hardly stand
the sight of you—but endure it I will if I can
see your strength made anew!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Is restored to what it once was. And with
you clad once more in your rightful flesh,
I shall permit you to resume your watch
over the Tower of Wrath.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_RAGE_000_CUT_010_030.text:
And with your strength and fury,
you are beautiful once more.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I have to thank you for saving me
the effort of hunting you down.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
The existence of a darkness like you
in the Conjoined Worlds is an error,
and your network of subjects can
no longer be allowed to fester.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
Annoyingly, you are immortal, so seeing
you excised from the Conjoined Worlds
is going to require considerable power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Man_Overworld_Plate
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_000.text: Fortunately, we have power to spare!

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
This little incident has proven an amusing
diversion! I had grown weary of spending
uneventful days perched upon my throne
with nothing to busy myself with.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
In light of the varied journeys I was able
to take across the worlds, I suppose
I ought to thank that unpleasant man.

SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_SIUG_DARKCASTLE_000_CUT_010.text:
I must also offer special thanks to you
Generals, for I very much look forward
to traveling alongside you once more.

SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W03_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_05.text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
